name: Seconds to survive
description:
Shoot zombies try to stay alive for 20 seconds.

  1. W A S D - movement 
  2. Mouse - rotate player
  3. L. Mouse trigger - fire
  4. L. Shift - sprint
  5. R - reload
  6. ESC - pause

Thank you for trying out my very first game and game jam.  I can't even tell you how many tutorials I have watched over the past weeks but I'm thankful for the support that has been available.  If I had more time I would put some more polish on the game and added more features but between work and kids here you go. 

TL;DR - THANK YOU , ESPECIALLY TO MY KIDS THAT HELPED ME WITH TESTING.

mixamo - animation and zombie character

low-poly gun- https://delthor-games.itch.io/gun-pack 

low-poly player- https://adamhajdu.itch.io/free-low-poly-character

building assets- https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/assetsville-town

music- https://uppbeat.io/track/pecan-pie/robots
